name: Ronald's History X (Beravor)
description:
Description:

Meet Ronald! Ronald doesn't understand colours. He even gets angry at them. Go on a journey, where you, as the player, help Ronald to appreciate different shapes and colours. 

The game was developed as a prototype for the rapid prototyping class. The beautiful crew is listed below: 

Arts: Mona Brandt

Game design : Arda Özel

Programming : Guilherme Rodrigues 

Gameplay:

Ronald's History X is a platformer game with unique levels. With every new colour environment that Ronald finds himself in, the gameplay changes a bit. In the blue level, the arrow keys are reversed, and in red the level, the empty spaces are the actual platforms!
